content.text: Hi, I'm getting ready to propose to my girlfriend tonight. I'm really nervous.
Oh, congratulations! What are you planning to do?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about taking her to dinner at her favorite restaurant.
That sounds like a great idea. What kind of restaurant is it?
It's a Italian restaurant. She loves Italian food.
That sounds perfect. I'm sure she'll love it.
What are you going to do after dinner?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about taking a walk in the park.
That's a great idea. It will give you two a chance to talk and relax.
Thanks. I think I'm going to do that.
I'm sure it will be perfect. You're going to make her very happy.
Thanks. I hope so. I'm really nervous, but I'm also excited.
That's understandable. It's a big moment. But I'm sure everything will go well.
